Help

About the App

This web application serves as an extension of the USTP prism, offering enhanced functionalities for efficient attendance monitoring. Instructors can effortlessly track student attendance in their classes through intuitive data visualizations and user-friendly navigation features, thereby simplifying the attendance checking process.

The application recieves real-time attendance data from its hardware device and displays the data in a table form accompanied by data visualizations.

Who can use the web application?

The primary target audience for this application is the instructors, given their pivotal role in attendance checking and monitoring. As individuals directly responsible for overseeing students' attendance records, instructors stand to benefit significantly from the application's features and functionalities tailored to streamline and enhance the efficiency of attendance management within their classes.

How to use the application?

Instructors can login using their accounts and once signed in, they will be able to access the dashboard which contains the summary of attendance records visualized through various visualization methods.

The instructor can manually record student attendance by navigating to the Attendance Page and clicking on the Take Attendance button. This will redirect to another page containing the list of students and allowing the instructor to record their attendance.

Users can keep track of their class schedules in the Class Schedule page which displays the user's class schedule in a time table.

Users can keep track of their monthly events, schedules, or reminders in the Calendar page which displays a full-calendar integrating a note-taking feature, allowing the user to take note of events and reminders for the entire year.

Forgot Password

If you happen to forget your password, worry not! Follow these simple steps to reset it.

  • Navigate to the login page
  • Click on the "Click Here" link
  • You will be prompted to enter the email address associated with your account
  • Enter your email, submit the form, and a password reset email will be sent to your inbox
  • Open your email and locate the email from the application, which includes a link to reset your password
  • Click on the provided link, and it will direct you to a page where you can set a new password for your account
  • Enter a new password and submit the form
  • Return to the login page, log in using your email address, and the new password you just set.
